snippet.title: Tailgate Devlog Issue 1 (Alpha footage)
snippet.description:
#cozygaming #adventure #indiegame #adventure #dogs #wip
A glimpse into updated visuals (models, textures, shaders, lighting) and s mall but of actual gameplay. You will see Hyde's house, where he realised that his human is missing. See a couple of NPCs like Duchess (the cat) and Mojo (the pug). It's still an early version so some assets and level of love to certain details may vary drastically.  

Wishlist Tailgate on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3046820/Tailgate/

Join Tailgate Discord
👉 https://discord.gg/9DT8jsesXt

Developer: Dmytro Yarynych

Twitter:  
https://x.com/dyarynych

Official site
https://tailgatethegame.com
